## set up

We will conduct a simulation study to investigate the power of the goodness-of-fit tests:

- KS
- Chi-squared
- Lilliesfors
- SW

1. Generate samples of size $n = {5,10,20,50,100}$ from
  - Chi-squared (df=3)
  - Student's t-Distribution (df=4)
